updates.details: Added new sheets extracted from Alhaitham's web event: 'The Six Faces of Wisdom'.
Added 170+ new parts/sheets datamined from the 1.6-3.3 Genshin Clients. Sheets extracted from TCG are in /tcg.
All image file sizes have been decreased (no quality change) and pages should now load significantly faster than before.
Assets from the 3.4 preview page (Alhaitham, Yaoyao, Ayaka & Lisa Skins) have been uploaded & Dehya and Mika splashart (nobg).
Genius Invokation TCG assets added to /tcg. 3.3 assets added. (e.g. Wanderer, Faruzan) & uploaded fanmade assets.
Wanderer web event assets uploaded as well as more collaboration emotes (Ayato, Ayaka, Beidou, Eula, Thoma & Amber).
Added assets found inside of the 3.3 preview page (inc. Wanderer, Faruzan, etc).
Added Paimon's Paintings XIX emotes, Kazuha (Cadillac) & Hu Tao (OnePlus) collab emotes & full splash art of Faruzan and Wanderer.
Missing Version 3.2 asset files are now available which includes splashart, items & character data.
Added a 'FAQ' section to the bottom of the /characterparts, /emotes and /splashart pages.
Added the 'Teyvat Times' Series Emojis: Vol. 5 to /emotes & some minor bugfixes.
Site optimizations, added new assets (more character parts & 3.3 character splash art) & UI changes.
Added assets from the 3.2 preview page. (e.g Nahida & Layla). Old characters have been skipped even if there is a tiny difference.
Added Nilou, Candace, Cyno & Razor emotes from the most recent HoYoLab update.
Added extra assets from 3.1 web events (such as Nilou & Cyno's web events).
Can now download multiple images at once, added 2022 concert character parts & added more emotes.
Automated how images are managed & the process for downloading all images is automatically updated.
Added loads of character parts & site optimization. Now possible to toggle viewing unreleased content in /etc.
Fixed bugs, website theme and layout has been redesigned and remaining 3.0 content has been added.
Added the first half of 3.0 characters (Tighnari and Collei) to /characters.
UI changes to help with theme consistency and overall website accessibility.
Fixed Yun Jin's incorrect rarity (5* -> 4*) & backend code rework (site optimization).
Added all assets and character parts that were found from the new 3.0 preview page.
Changed /characters & /artifact pages & some other various UI changes.
Switched hosting Provider from Netlify to Cloudflare Pages (site may be slower than usual for a while).
Added In-Game emotes (also known as 'stickers') to wanderer.moe/emotes.
Various UI changes around the site to help with scaling and theme consistency.
Added a Navbar for smaller / medium screens to help with overall site navigation.
Added a search feature for /characterparts & /splashart, making it easier for you to search for whatever you need.
Added reccomended artifacts for each character in /characters (chosen from multiple sources).
2.8 character parts are now available on /characterparts & added Heizou's data in /characters.
